item.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Tesla, Apple, Disney, Sunrun, Carmax, Eli Lilly, MP Materials & more
item.description: Here are Monday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Citi lifts Nvidia price target heading into AI giant's earnings report
item.description: Citi sees more upside for Nvidia heading into its third-quarter report due out Nov 19.

item.title: Buy this personal lending stock on healthy U.S. consumer, says Citizens
item.description: The bank upgraded the personal lender to market outperform from market perform.

item.title: This rare earth stock has been on fire this year. Deutsche Bank sees more gains ahead
item.description: Deutsche Bank sees shares of MP Materials rising 21% from here, on top of an already staggering year-to-date rally.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts favor these 3 tech stocks for their growth outlook
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service discusses three stocks that are favored by Wall Street, including Amazon and Alphabet.
